channel.title: Grabscape | Double Xp Weekends | HD | Full Fight Kiln | All skills
channel.description:
Hello, This is a Server we have been anticipating to come out, a fun to play Pre-EOC server. This is grabscape, were back. With the fall of RuneScape due to the EOC we are remaining with a Pre-EOC style server and wanted to start a server that people can come play and just hangout in with the community. We are a 24/7 server, currently working on getting a better VPS than our last one. We aren't the biggest of communitys out there but we are trying and wanting to grow If you give us a chance we think you'd rather enjoy your stay with us. Feel free to stop by and give us a shot. Thanks, Hope to see you there.
Website: www.grabscape.weebly.com
Current Forums: www.grabscapeforums.createaforum.com
Server Features:
All Skills working 100% Working Emotes, including skillcapes! Easy Money Making Not to hard and not to easy xp rates with double xp weekends!
Bosses:
King BLack Dragon Queen Black Dragon Tormented Demons Corporal Beast Daggonath Kings God Wars Nomad Glacors Nex Avatar of Destruction
Minigames:
Dominion Tower Pest Control Barrow's Full Fight Caves! Full Fight Kiln! Clan Wars Castle Wars Crucible Zombies
Pking:
Edge ville Mage Bank Revenants
Nex Armour with HP boost All Special attacks working! Downloadable Client Working! We even have loyalty points! Hope to see some of you there! Here are some Pictures!
Home [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2wf5qht.png[/img]
Dungs [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/i20x0g.png[/img]
Prayers [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/m7wcwn.png[/img]
Commands [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2jdp9wo.png[/img]
Bank Tabs [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/nxoviq.png[/img]
Loyalty Points [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2rfdny8.png[/img]
Glacors [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2ex7t4w.png[/img]
Customiseable Capes [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2j2fbyu.png[/img]
Comp Emote [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/wi7o04.png[/img]
Max Emote [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2qjzpn8.png[/img]
Queen Black Dragon [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/34zk4ra.png[/img]
Storm of Armadyl [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2ezqxpl.png[/img]
HD [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2r5gl80.png[/img]
D Tower [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2v8rbcm.png[/img]
Full Working Nex [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/20hlpg6.png[/img]
Summoning Bob [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2jdnyhu.png[/img]
Hope you stop by!
Owner = Rex Co-Owner = Mod Jebus

item.description:
@p3rdue wrote:

Hello, This is a Server we have been anticipating to come out, a fun to play Pre-EOC server.
This is grabscape, were back. With the fall of RuneScape due to the EOC
we are remaining with a Pre-EOC style server and wanted to start a server that people
can come play and just hangout in with the community.
We are a 24/7 server, currently working on getting a better VPS than our last one.
We aren’t the biggest of communitys out there but we are trying and wanting to grow
If you give us a chance we think you’d rather enjoy your stay with us.
Feel free to stop by and give us a shot.
Thanks, Hope to see you there.
